ygData.subject: Re: Im a GM helping giving items!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Yep. I would have to say there s something fishy here too. Verant has specifically said that they re not asking for passwords. And regardless of being angry at
ygData.messageBody:
Yep. I would have to say there's something fishy
here too. Verant has specifically said that they're
not asking for passwords. And regardless of being
angry at Verant... most of their GM's don't have that
kind of power. There are a few GM's that can swing
that kind of thing-- but as I understand it... most
can't.<br><br>And worse yet... once they have your password, they
have your account. They change your password and it's
essentially their account from then on. So even if it is
legit, I wouldn't risk it cause they could change my
password at anytime if I gave them my station name and
password.<br><br>shooman out<br>Fatehue Prismatic<br>Catza Baby White
Tiger Warrior. Heh. Pity me for I meow. =)
